testcase.name: User should see main tabs,clicks Our Technologies and verify IOS Developer position' position is right
testcase.system-out: Given user navigates to web page............................................passed And verify the web page is opened...........................................passed And user should see 4 main tab section on the homepage......................passed And user clicks "Our Technologies" tab......................................passed Then verify the relevant section is opened..................................passed When user scroll down.......................................................passed Then verify Open Roles section is present...................................passed Then User verify that "iOS Developer" position is under the Software Development section..passed And User clicks to "iOS Developer" position.................................passed Then verify the new tab is opened...........................................passed
